main_topic.author: justin1357
main_topic.title: [???] Crazy lb 0.707 run in just 1h
main_topic.content: It's impossible to get this score by modeling, is it leak?

comments.author: heartkilla
comments.content: It is either a leak or a huge breakthrough in preference modeling and the guy is one step away from creating GPT-6
comments.date: Posted 7 hours ago  ·  15th in this Competition

comments.author: sayoulala
comments.content: I believe it's very likely. My training set loss couldn't even reach that score. As of now, his score has risen to 0.6 again… I hope Kaggle officials can handle this fairly.
comments.date: Posted 8 hours ago  ·  3rd in this Competition

comments.author: sayoulala
comments.content: This is incredibly hard to accept.I think there might have been a data leak. Kaggle officials should address this issue; otherwise, it wouldn't be fair.   [@sohier](https://www.kaggle.com/sohier) [@addisonhoward](https://www.kaggle.com/addisonhoward)

comments.content: very likely a leak given the score, he had short subs for weeks, now revealing the full leak apparently

reply.content: i felt pretty demotivated now, after burning so much computes for this comp

reply.author: Psi
reply.content:
I feel particularly bad because we reported a leak early in this competition which is why the scoring changed.

And now the top scores were all very close approaching similar limits, so an exciting finish was ahead of us.

And now this… hope Kaggle can find some way to salvage this somehow. [@sohier](https://www.kaggle.com/sohier) [@addisonhoward](https://www.kaggle.com/addisonhoward)
